restaurants.name: Ducky Duck
restaurants.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

restaurants.name: Fairy Cafe
restaurants.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

restaurants.name: Merah Putih Restaurant
restaurants.description: Merah Putih Restaurant merupakan restoran yang menyajikan santapan lokal berkualitas tinggi berkat menunya yang mencampurkan hidangan tradisional dan makanan fusion Asia. Tata letaknya unik dengan atrium besar yang terdiri dari kolom transparan tinggi.

restaurants.name: Kesuma Restaurant
restaurants.description: resto ini didirikan oleh pasangan Indonesia dan Perancis yang ingin berbagi semangat untuk budaya dan tradisi Yogyakarta di dekat Kraton Kesultanan istana. Menu yang ditawarkan adalah makanan-makanan asli Solo dan Jogja, seperti Bergedel, Bakwan dan Lumpia.

restaurants.name: The Sawah
restaurants.description: Rumah makan ini sudah sejak lama berdiri dan memiliki penggemar dari berbagai daerah. Restoran Yogyakarta yang satu ini mengusung konsep alami berupa pemandangan sawah yang sejuk dan segar.

restaurants.name: Kampung Daun
restaurants.description: Tempat wisata kuliner, alam, bahkan budaya. Sebelum berdiri rumah makan, dulu merupakan hutan lebat dan perbukitan. Diapit pula oleh Desa Cigugur dan Cihideung. Setelah melalui proses pembangunan, tahun 1999 tempat makan ini mulai beroperasi.

restaurants.name: Warung Paradiso
restaurants.description: Warung Paradiso merupakan tempat makan sederhana di tepi pantai Senggigi, tepatnya di Jalan Raya Mangsit, Senggigi, Lombok Barat. Makanannya sangat enak, terutama untuk menu makanan laut.

restaurants.name: Layar
restaurants.description: Layar Seafood merupakan salah satu restaurant seafood andalan di kota Surabaya. Rumah makan ini menggunakan concept seafood market dengan berbagai pilihan menu.
